\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* unto \w me|strong="H0539"\w* \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, Urias \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Zacharias \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Barachias.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Take|strong="H5779"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w together|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* defeated: \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* done: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w taught|strong="H3256"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w strong|strong="H2393"\w* \w arm|strong="H3027"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H4172"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w dread|strong="H6206"\w*.
